abstract: Yahoo appointed Frank Biondi and John Chapple to its board as part of its settlement of its proxy fight with corporate raider Carl Icahn.
snippet: Yahoo appointed Frank Biondi and John Chapple to its board as part of its settlement of its proxy fight with corporate raider Carl Icahn.
lead_paragraph: The Yahoo-Carl Icahn saga is entering a new phase. Yahoo said Thursday that it appointed Frank J. Biondi Jr. and John H. Chapple to its board. Their appointment, which had been expected, follows an agreement last month under which Mr. Icahn ended a proxy fight to replace Yahoo’s entire board in exchange for three seats on an expanded Yahoo board. Mr. Icahn was appointed earlier this month to Yahoo’s 11-member board.

headline.main: Yahoo Appoints 2 Icahn Allies to Its Board
